author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Define a new scenario D41 with the more recent version of HGCal geometry (C8). Also changes are made to overall system (O3 derived from O2) and MTD (I9 derived from I7) which need to be changed

#### PR validation:

Overlap test is completed and with changes in ETL geometry and once the PR 

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR#26153 added there is no overlap in calorimeter region

If this PR is integrated we can close PR #26155
title: Phase2 hgx186 Define a new scenario D41
